Name: Connect NCDOT
Description: Lead a team of six designers, content editors, and analysts to build a government business partner resource site utilizing SharePoint.

Name: Mazda6 SharePoint Resources
Description: Filling a need to learn new tools - and to celebrate my new car - this site was build to demonstrate the design flexibility in SharePoint while using Bootstrap and the jQuery SPservices library.
Wit: I like my car, I like SharePoint.
AltText: Screenshot of the Mazda6 SharPoint site

Name: Booze It And Lose It
Description: Promotional site built for the NC Department of Transportation, highlighting their anti-drunk-driving campaign. I used this as an apportunity to learn client-side templating with Handlebar.js.
Wit: Promotional site using client side templating

Name: SharePoint Infographic Poster
Description: Created an infographic poster for the NC Department of Transportation to help their knowledge workers understand where to store and save their many, many files.
Wit: So, listen up, this is the plan

Name: SharePoint Search Infographic Poster
Description: Created an infographic poster for the NC Department of Transportation to help their folks better understand how to use SharePoint search.

Name: Datacorp Website
Description: A full website redesign for a Rhode Island-based social science research outfit. Built on Wordpress for easy updates and maintenance.

Name: NCDOT Mobile
Description: Built in just a few weeks on existing platforms (jQuery Mobile) and data sources (RSS feeds) NCDOT Mobile is a touchscreen optimized website for North Carolina citizens and travelers on the go.

Name: Twitter Profile Icons
Description: The NC Department of Transportation crated a series of Twitter accounts to support its social media outreach effort. For each account a unique icon and backround set was created to help connect the topic with the departments communications team.

Name: NCDOT Homepage Redesign
Description: The NC Department of Transportation's homepage was in need of a realignment based on user tasks and an overall lack of content discoverability.  It was rebuilt using sketches, wireframes, full-fidelity mockups, and finally HTML CSS and JavaScript.
AltText: NC Department of Transportation home page

Name: I-85 Corridor Improvement Project Website
Description: The NC Department of Transportation needed to showcase a high-profile project along a major transportation corridor. A custom site template was designed and built in a few weeks.

Name: Drive Green Save Green
Description: A custom site template design for the NC Department of Transportation's fuel-conservation efforts. The interactive elements are loaded with the lab.js helper library to ensure the fastest possible load times.
Wit: No cheaper fuel than the kind you don't use

Name: North Woods Animal Treats
Description: Built for a New Hampshire based natural animal-foods company.  A mix of product information and ecommerce features, all running on a custom Wordpress template.
Wit: Tasty treats for pets. No Kitten Mittens

Name: Hodess Construction Website
Description: Redesigned a Massachusetts-based construction company website using a minimalist page layout. Custom Wordpress tags and categories power the navigation allowing them to highlight their very technical projects to specific customers.

Name: NCDOT Rest Area Map
Description: For the NC Department of Transportation - An interactive state map highlighting where each of the state's rest areas and welcome centers are. It uses the Bing Maps Javscript API with custom layers to shade out the areas out of the state.
Wit: Take a break for safety's sake
AltText: Screenshot of NCDOT Rest Area Map

Name: PatrickDoran.com from 2010
Description: My last porfolio site. Served me well from 2010 till 2014.

Name: PatrickDoran.com from 2007
Description: An older version of my porfolio site. In use from from 2007 till 2010.
